title: theliyaka nEjEsina
sahitya:
teliyaka nEjEsina duDukella mAncarA



anupallavi



 kaliyuga varadA shrI kArtikEya karunA sAgarA



caraNam 1



nara janmamu durbalamani erigiyuNDi I kSaNAdi arivarggamulalO tagili tirigi ceDidi sharavaNabhava



caraNam 2



hariharAdi bhajanamuvalE Atmastuti paliki tanuvu sthiramani garvinci nenaru maraci ceDiti sharavaNabhava



caraNam 3



harikEshapurIshA ninnu svaratALamutO pogaDaga paradhanamula nAsapaDi nI padabhajanamu maraci ceDiti
